page.title: 12Trade in Western Enfield
page.content: We did a shopping survey in our three main shopping areas.In order of size these are Cockfosters,Oakwood and Grange Park.There are also smaller shopping areas and individual shops. In Cockfosters there are fifteen food shops six hair and beauty salons,five off licences,seven shoe shops,eight D.I.Y stores,nine cloths shops,five chemists,four cleaners,two estate agents,four travel agents and three banks and building societies. In Oakwood there are three food shops one newsagent,two hair and beauty salons,one shoe shop,one D.I.Y store and one chemist. In Grange Park therer are four food shops,two newsagents,two hair and beauty salons,one off licence,one shoe shop,three D.I.Y stores,one chemist,one cleaners,one electrical shop and two estate agents.
